document_data.name: Rheligaun Darakh
document_data.mainbody: '''Rheligaun Darakh''', who was also called '''the Horned''', was the sixth and final [[Nentyarch]] of the [[Darakh Dynasty]] to rule [[Narfell]]. He was referred to as the '''Hidden Nentyarch'''.
document_data.Activities: Rheligaun overthrew and slew his cousin [[Ilithkar Darakh]] to take the ''[[Crown of Narfell]]'' and become Nentyarch in {{Yearlink|-181}}. He ruled until {{Yearlink|-150}} when Narfell collapsed during the [[Great Conflagration (war)|Great Conflagration]]. Rheligaun disappeared during this time and was assumed dead.
document_data.Relationships: Rheligaun was the [[half-fiend]] offspring of a human woman and the [[demon lord]] [[Fraz-Urb'luu]].
